review: Doesn't work with my iPhone at all.  I used it with my laptop and I have cable internet and a new router but there was still a delay and it froze a lot.  Was not what I expected or hoped for.
author: A. Pike

review: Does not work. Has to reload about five times an hour. Unusable and unreturnable. It had someone else's info programmed into it, so it was used. We didn't use it much for a few months so now we cant return it. Bummer
author: Charles E. Holcomb

review: Great product, second one I get
author: Julio Ceballos

review: Use with Amazon Prime mostly and it works well using iPhone as casting device.  For those unfamiliar with Chromecast, once you have started the cast, your device, such as iPhone, is no longer needed or involved in watching the program.  The casting device just kind of acts as the remote to select the internet source that you want to watch.
author: Eric Scarbro

review: Completely changes the way we watch TV now. Don't even remember what life was like before Chromecast.
author: Erick

review: Its okay only really works with you tube well. need to have amazing WIFI fir it to work with Netflix. i get 60mbs for my wifi and i still cant stream a movie properly.
author: Josh
